uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.config

Class CachedConfigService

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.config.CachedConfigService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AppContextService<ConfigService>, ConfigService, Contexed

    public class CachedConfigService
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConfigService
    Cache Properties in a global static variable. This can be turned off with configuration parameters but it has to be done within this class to make sure that the queries to the underlying services to check the feature are not made when the cache IS active. The dependencies between this and the DataBaseConfigService are very fragile so edit this at your own peril.
    Author:
    spb

      • clearServiceProperties

        public void clearServiceProperties()
        Description copied from interface: ConfigService
        clear any cached properties. This will cause the properties to be re-read the next time getServiceProperties is called. Implementations are permitted not to cache data in which case this is a No-op.
        Specified by:
